messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Holes book, movie
messages.msgSnippet: I dropped Anna and JP off to see Holes again today.  I had a meeting at school, ( my school) for a final project and they didnt want to go.  Anyway, on the way
messages.messageBody:
I dropped Anna and JP off to see Holes again today. I had a meeting at
school, ( my school) for a final project and they didnt want to go. Anyway,
on the way home, Anna said.. "Madame Zeroni is the same voice as Yzma on The
Emperors New Groove" I said, "really, are you sure?" She said.."yeah, I
think so, I figured it out, they sound just alike" We came home and put in
ENG and then looked up the credits for both movies.. She was right, it's
Eartha Kitt in both movies.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Holes book, movie
messages.msgSnippet: No, I didn t, Mary.  Good idea, thanks for the pointer!  Must do that....I ve been reading a lot of Unschooling material lately and just haven t had the time!
messages.messageBody:
No, I didn't, Mary. Good idea, thanks for the pointer! Must do that....I've
been reading a lot of Unschooling material lately and just haven't had the
time! :)

Susan

In a message dated 5/7/2003 2:24:01 PM Central Standard Time,
zenmomma@... writes:

> Did you get to read it and see it too, Susan? The book and movie are
> both very good. A very worthwhile experience to share with your kids.
>
> Life is good.
> ~Mary
>
